Text.Page:
Inside, you'll find a pool of blood. Killian summoned golems around it, and if they start wandering off...

...well, honestly, I have no idea what will happen, but I can't imagine it will be good, can you?

Get inside and deactivate those golems before they can run off and start doing...whatever horrible thing Killian summoned them for.

Oh, I'm so grateful. I was really worried for a while.

Thank you.
